nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.rest

Class RestAuthenticationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.rest.RestAuthenticationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationProvider

    public class RestAuthenticationProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationProvider
    An AuthenticationProvider which validates the username / password in Cyclos. WARN: Can't throw AuthenticationException cause it returns 401 UNAUTHORIZED and that is captured by the browser, pops up an authentication form and we don't want that. A 401 freezes the mobile app.
    Author:
    luis
